name: Super Hyper Mega Turbo PONG
description:
Entry for 1º #RetoGamedev Jam

"Pong with a twist"

Like any Pong, the objetive is to get the ball into the enemy area. 

Use your secondary balls to  get easy defense or throw them to attack.

KEYS:
- Move: UP / Down  Arrows
- B:  to throw a ball
- N: get back the balls

MUSIC by RoyaltyFreeTube
